content.en: Seismic algorithm advancements: Scientists have developed new algorithms to address challenges in seismic data processing. These algorithms improve the effectiveness of migration methods, enhance the imaging of complex geological structures, and suppress noise and multiples in seismic data. They also propose techniques to improve migration from irregular surfaces, simplify 3D prestack migration, and make 3D wave-equation migration more efficient. These advancements in algorithmic techniques contribute to better seismic imaging and analysis.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for seismiske algoritmer: Forskere har udviklet nye algoritmer til at tackle udfordringer i seismisk databehandling. Disse algoritmer forbedrer effektiviteten af migrationsmetoder, forbedrer billeddannelsen af komplekse geologiske strukturer og undertrykker støj og multipler i seismiske data. De foreslår også teknikker til at forbedre migration fra uregelmæssige overflader, forenkle 3D pre-stack migration og gøre 3D bølgelignings-migration mere effektiv. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmiske teknikker bidrager til bedre seismisk billeddannelse og analyse.
